Table.Name: ArchiveCurationHistory
Table.Description: Contains details of the matrix of the Archives' required curation tasks

Column.Name: cuEventID
Column.Description: UID of curation event giving rise to this record

Column.Name: cuID
Column.Description: the unique curation task ID

Column.Name: logFile
Column.Description: filename of verbose logged task output

Column.Name: resultsFile
Column.Description: filename of any results file

Column.Name: timeStamp
Column.Description: Time of the completion of the whole task

Column.Name: curator
Column.Description: The archive curation scientist responsible for this event

Column.Name: comment
Column.Description: Comment string supplied by the curator

Column.Name: rolledBack
Column.Description: Flag for roll-back of this event: 0=no, 1 = yes

Table.Name: AstrCalVers
Table.Description: Contains a record for every astrometric calibration version in the archive

Column.Name: versNum
Column.Description: Version number of current astrometric solution

Column.Name: cuEventID
Column.Description: UID of curation event giving rise to this record

Column.Name: startDate
Column.Description: MJD of the start time for this version of the calibration

Column.Name: endDate
Column.Description: MJD of the end time for this version of the calibration

Table.Name: CurationTask
Table.Description: Contains a list of all curation tasks that are used within the OSA

Column.Name: cuID
Column.Description: the unique curation task ID

Column.Name: description
Column.Description: description in words for this task

Table.Name: CurrentAstrometry
Table.Description: Contains the current astrometric calibration coefficients

Column.Name: multiframeID
Column.Description: the UID of the relevant multiframe

Column.Name: extNum
Column.Description: the extension number of this frame

Column.Name: cuEventID
Column.Description: UID of curation event giving rise to this record

Column.Name: cTypeX
Column.Description: G&C WCS type, eg 'RA---ZPN' {image extension keyword: CTYPE1}

Column.Name: cTypeY
Column.Description: G&C WCS type, eg 'DEC--ZPN' {image extension keyword: CTYPE2}

Column.Name: crValY
Column.Description: Coordinate value at reference point on axis 2 {image extension keyword: CRVAL2}

Column.Name: crUnit1
Column.Description: Unit of right ascension co-ordinates {image extension keyword: CRUNIT1}

Column.Name: crUnit2
Column.Description: Unit of declination co-ordinates {image extension keyword: CRUNIT2}

Column.Name: crPixX
Column.Description: Pixel coordinate of the reference point on axis 1 {image extension keyword: CRPIX1}

Column.Name: crPixY
Column.Description: Pixel coordinate of the reference point on axis 2 {image extension keyword: CRPIX2}

Column.Name: cd11

Column.Name: cd21
Column.Description: Element of the linear transformation matrix (with scale) {image extension keyword: CD2_1}

Column.Name: cd12
Column.Description: Element of the linear transformation matrix (with scale) {image extension keyword: CD1_2}

Column.Name: cd22
Column.Description: Element of the linear transformation matrix (with scale) {image extension keyword: CD2_2}

Column.Name: tc33

Column.Name: tc35
Column.Description: WCS transform matrix element {catalogue extension keyword: TC3_5}

Column.Name: tc53
Column.Description: WCS transform matrix element {catalogue extension keyword: TC5_3}

Column.Name: tc55
Column.Description: WCS transform matrix element {catalogue extension keyword: TC5_5}

Column.Name: tcrpx3
Column.Description: Pixel coordinate at ref point {catalogue extension keyword: TCRPX3}

Column.Name: tcrpx5
Column.Description: Pixel coordinate at ref point {catalogue extension keyword: TCRPX5}

Column.Name: tcrvl3
Column.Description: Coordinate value at ref pixel {catalogue extension keyword: TCRVL3}

Column.Name: tcrvl5
Column.Description: Coordinate value at ref pixel {catalogue extension keyword: TCRVL5}

Column.Name: tctyp3
Column.Description: Coordinate/projection type {catalogue extension keyword: TCTYP3}

Column.Name: tctyp5
Column.Description: Coordinate/projection type {catalogue extension keyword: TCTYP5}

Column.Name: wcsPass
Column.Description: Pass level of WCS {image extension keyword: WCSPASS}

Column.Name: numRms
Column.Description: No. of astrometric standards used in fit {image extension keyword: NUMBRMS}

Column.Name: numStds
Column.Description: Number of standards available {image extension keyword: NUMSTDS}

Column.Name: stdCRms
Column.Description: RMS residual of fit to astrometric standards {image extension keyword: STDCRMS}

Column.Name: overScan
Column.Description: Overscan correction done {image extension keyword: OVERSCAN}

Column.Name: refRaShift01
Column.Description: Ref RA shift pass 0 to 1 (new - old) {image extension keyword: RAZP01}

Column.Name: refDecShift01
Column.Description: Ref Dec shift pass 0 to 1 (new - old) {image extension keyword: DECZP01}

Column.Name: refRaShift02
Column.Description: Ref RA shift pass 0 to 2 (new - old) {image extension keyword: RAZP02}

Column.Name: refDecShift02
Column.Description: Ref Dec shift pass 0 to 2 (new - old) {image extension keyword: DECZP02}

Column.Name: refRaShift12

Column.Name: refDecShift12
Column.Description: Ref Dec shift pass 1 to 2 (new - old) {image extension keyword: DECZP12}

Column.Name: refRaShift22

Column.Name: refDecShift22
Column.Description: Ref Dec shift pass 2 to 2 (new - old) {image extension keyword: DECZP22}

Column.Name: distortMap
Column.Description: filename of 2d non-linear distortion map

Column.Name: centralRa
Column.Description: RA (J2000) at device centre

Column.Name: centralDec
Column.Description: Dec (J2000) at device centre

Column.Name: cx
Column.Description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinates of device centre

Column.Name: cy
Column.Description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinates of device centre

Column.Name: cz
Column.Description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinates of device centre

Column.Name: htmID
Column.Description: Hierarchical Triangular Mesh (HTM) index, 20 deep, for equatorial co-ordinates of device centre

Column.Name: posAngle
Column.Description: orientation of image x-axis to N-S

Column.Name: l
Column.Description: Galactic longitude of device centre

Column.Name: b
Column.Description: Galactic latitude of device centre

Column.Name: lambda
Column.Description: SDSS system spherical co-ordinate 1 of device centre

Column.Name: eta
Column.Description: SDSS system spherical co-ordinate 2 of device centre

Column.Name: imageExtent
Column.Description: The maximum angular extent from the central position

Column.Name: minRa
Column.Description: The minimum RA (J2000) on the device

Column.Name: minDec
Column.Description: The minimum Dec (J2000) on the device

Column.Name: maxRa
Column.Description: The maximum RA (J2000) on the device

Column.Name: maxDec
Column.Description: The maximum Dec (J2000) on the device

Column.Name: xPixSize
Column.Description: Angular size of pixels in X

Column.Name: yPixSize
Column.Description: Angular size of pixels in Y

Table.Name: EpochFrameStatus
Table.Description: Contains details of which image(s) are used in epochs in mergelog

Column.Name: programmeID
Column.Description: OSA assigned programme UID {image primary HDU keyword: HIERARCH ESO OBS PROG ID}

Column.Name: multiframeID
Column.Description: the UID of the relevant multiframe

Column.Name: cuEventID
Column.Description: UID of curation event giving rise to this record

Column.Name: productID
Column.Description: Product ID of deep stack frame (or intermediate stack if used as a deep stack). {image primary HDU keyword: PRODID}

Column.Name: releaseNum
Column.Description: Release number of deep stack frame (or intermediate stack if used as a deep stack). {image primary HDU keyword: RELNUM}

Column.Name: productType
Column.Description: Product type (stack,tile,mosaic)

Table.Name: ExternalProduct
Table.Description: Contains details of external products imported into archiv

Column.Name: programmeID
Column.Description: the unique programme ID

Column.Name: productType
Column.Description: The product type within the imported directory

Column.Name: description
Column.Description: Description of the product set

Column.Name: institution
Column.Description: Name of the institution that created the product

Column.Name: creator
Column.Description: Name of the individual that created the product

Column.Name: releaseNum
Column.Description: Release number of deep stack frame (or intermediate stack if used as a deep stack).

Column.Name: directory
Column.Description: Name of directory which these data reside in

Column.Name: fileNameRoot
Column.Description: File name root of the products

Column.Name: zeroPoint
Column.Description: Zeropoint of each product

Column.Name: zpSystem
Column.Description: System of zeropoint (Vega/AB)

Table.Name: ExternalSurvey
Table.Description: A list of all externally produced survey products held in the OSA

Column.Name: surveyID
Column.Description: the unique identifier for the survey

Column.Name: surveyName
Column.Description: The short name of the survey, eg. SDSS-EDR, SDSS-DR1, USNOB etc.

Column.Name: databaseName
Column.Description: The name of the database within the OSA

Column.Name: description
Column.Description: A brief description of the survey

Column.Name: imagesLocation
Column.Description: Pathname to the pixels (eg. for list-driven remeasurement)

Table.Name: ExternalSurveyTable
Table.Description: Contains information about the external surveys tables

Column.Name: surveyID
Column.Description: the unique identifier for the survey

Column.Name: extTableID
Column.Description: the unique table ID

Column.Name: extTableName
Column.Description: the name of the table

Column.Name: sourceIDName
Column.Description: The source unique identifier in the table

Column.Name: coord1
Column.Description: The attribute name of the first (longitudinal) spherical co-ordinate, e.g. equatorial RA

Column.Name: coord2
Column.Description: The attribute name of the second (latitudinal) spherical co-ordinate, e.g. equatorial Dec

Table.Name: Filter
Table.Description: Contains details of the OMEGACAM filters

Column.Name: filterID
Column.Description: UID of combined filter (assigned in OSA: 1=u,2=g,3=r,4=i,5=z,6=blank)

Column.Name: shortName
Column.Description: Short identification name for the filter

Column.Name: name
Column.Description: The name of the filter, eg. "U_SDSS", "SLOAN Z" etc.

Column.Name: description
Column.Description: a concise description of the filter

Column.Name: cutOn
Column.Description: The 50% cut-on wavelength of the filter

Column.Name: cutOff
Column.Description: The 50% cut-off wavelength of the filter

Column.Name: aebv
Column.Description: The constant to multiply the Schlegel map E(B-V) by to get the total galactic extinction.

Column.Name: vegaToAB
Column.Description: The constant to convert Vega magnitudes to AB magnitudes.

Column.Name: oneSecMLVg
Column.Description: The Vega magnitude limit of a 1s exposure in this filter

Column.Name: isSectioned
Column.Description: Is the focal plane sectioned into different filters, 0 No, 1 Yes. If so, data for each section in FilterSections and SectionDetectors

Column.Name: filterType
Column.Description: The type of filter BROAD, NARROW, BROADLIST

Table.Name: FilterSections
Table.Description: Contains details of the different sections of sectioned OMEGACAM filters

Column.Name: filterID
Column.Description: UID of combined filter (assigned in OSA: 1=u,2=g,3=r,4=i,5=z,6=blank)

Column.Name: sectionID
Column.Description: UID of section of focal plane with different filter

Column.Name: shortName
Column.Description: Short identification name for the filter section

Column.Name: cutOn
Column.Description: The 50% cut-on wavelength of the filter

Column.Name: cutOff
Column.Description: The 50% cut-off wavelength of the filter

Column.Name: aebv
Column.Description: The constant to multiply the Schlegel map E(B-V) by to get the total galactic extinction.

Column.Name: vegaToAB
Column.Description: The constant to convert Vega magnitudes to AB magnitudes.

Column.Name: oneSecMLVg
Column.Description: The Vega magnitude limit of a 1s exposure in this filter

Table.Name: Multiframe
Table.Description: Contains details of all multiframes stored in the archive

Column.Description: UID of the multiframe (assigned sequentially by the archive ingest process)

Column.Name: vstRunNo
Column.Description: Original VST Atlas run number (from filename)

Column.Name: creationDate
Column.Description: File creation date (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS) {image primary HDU keyword: DATE}

Column.Name: frameType
Column.Description: The type of multiframe (eg. stack|tile|mosaic|difference|calibration|interleaved etc).

Column.Name: cuEventID
Column.Description: UID of curation event giving rise to this record

Column.Name: julianDayNum
Column.Description: the Julian Day number of the VST night

Column.Name: fileTimeStamp
Column.Description: Time stamp digits (from the original CASU directory name and file time stamp) for enforcing uniqueness

Column.Name: filterName
Column.Description: VST combined filter name {image primary HDU keyword: HIERARCH ESO INS FILT1 NAME}

Column.Name: filterID
Column.Description: UID of combined filter (assigned in OSA: 1=u,2=g,3=r,4=i,5=z)

Column.Name: project
Column.Description: Time-allocation code

Column.Name: telescope
Column.Description: ESO telescope name {image primary HDU keyword: TELESCOP}

Column.Name: instrument
Column.Description: Instrument name {image primary HDU keyword: INSTRUME}

Column.Name: arcfile
Column.Description: Archive File Name {image primary HDU keyword: ARCFILE}

Column.Name: bitsPerPix
Column.Description: number of bits per data pixel {image primary HDU keyword: BITPIX}

Column.Name: utDate
Column.Description: UT date when this file was written (MM-DD-YYYY)

Column.Name: dateObs
Column.Description: Observing date {image primary HDU keyword: DATE-OBS}

Column.Name: mjdObs
Column.Description: Modified Julian Date of the observation start {image primary HDU keyword: MJD-OBS}

Column.Name: equinox
Column.Description: Standard FK5 {image primary HDU keyword: EQUINOX}

Column.Name: lst

Column.Name: utc
Column.Description: UTC at start {image primary HDU keyword: UTC}

Column.Name: raBase

Column.Name: decBase
Column.Description: Declination of base position (J2000) {image primary HDU keyword: DEC}

Column.Name: raDecSys
Column.Description: Coordinate reference frame {image primary HDU keyword: RADECSYS}

Column.Name: expTime

Column.Name: naxis
Column.Description: number of data axes {image primary HDU keyword: NAXIS}

Column.Name: object
Column.Description: Original target. {image primary HDU keyword: OBJECT}

Column.Name: observer

Column.Name: numDetectors
Column.Description: The number of "detectors" (=image extensions in FITS file)

Column.Name: obstype

Column.Name: origfile
Column.Description: Original File Name {image primary HDU keyword: ORIGFILE}

Column.Name: picoi

Column.Name: previewv

Column.Name: wfrtype

Column.Name: masktype
Column.Description: Mask type {image primary HDU keyword: MASKTYPE}

Column.Name: skyAlgorithm
Column.Description: Sky estimation algorithm {image primary HDU keyword: SKYALGO}

Column.Name: amEnd
Column.Description: Airmass at end of observation {image primary HDU keyword: HIERARCH ESO TEL AIRM END}

Column.Name: esoDecMoon
Column.Description: Declination of the Moon (J2000) (deg) {image primary HDU keyword: HIERARCH ESO TEL MOON DEC}

Column.Name: decMoon
Column.Description: Geocentric J2000 FK5 Mean Declination of the Moon

Column.Description: Illumination of the Moon

Column.Description: Apparent topocentric Right ascension of the Moon (including precession, nutation, and annual aberration)

Column.Name: decMoonTopo
Column.Description: Apparent topocentric Declination of the Moon (including precession, nutation, and annual aberration)

Column.Name: fileName
Column.Description: the filename for the multiframe, eg. server:/path/filename.fit

Column.Name: catName
Column.Description: the filename of the associated catalogue MEF, eg. server:/path/filename.fits

Column.Name: uncorrCatName
Column.Description: the filename of the associated catalogue MEF containing data without illumination correction, eg. server:/path/filename.fits

Column.Name: versionNum
Column.Description: a version number for this frame (if available)

Column.Name: darkID
Column.Description: UID of library calibration dark frame {image extension keyword: DARKCOR}

Column.Name: confID
Column.Description: UID of library calibration confidence frame {image extension keyword: CIR_CPM}

Column.Name: flatID
Column.Description: UID of library calibration flatfield frame {image extension keyword: FLATSRC}

Column.Name: fringeID
Column.Description: UID of library calibration fringe frame {image extension keyword: DEFRINGE}

Column.Name: biasID
Column.Description: UID of library bias frame {image extension keyword: BIASSRC}

Column.Name: fringeScale
Column.Description: Fringe frame scale factor {image extension keyword: DEFRINGE}

Column.Name: deprecated
Column.Description: Code for a current (=0) or deprecated (!=0) multiframe

Column.Name: newlyIngested
Column.Description: Curation flag for internal use only (0=no, 1=yes)

Column.Name: illumFile
Column.Description: File name of CASU created photometric illumination correction used on catalogue data from this file

Column.Name: unfilteredID
Column.Description: UID of original unfiltered frame corresponding to this filtered frame

Column.Name: casuVers
Column.Description: CASU Release Version Number {image primary HDU keyword: CASUVERS}

Column.Description: OB status, can be 'Completed', 'Executed' (which means it has to be repeated) or 'Aborted'. {image primary HDU keyword: OBSTATUS}

Column.Name: esoGrade
Column.Description: ESO QC grade: 'A' if fully under constrains, 'B' if mostly (90%) under constrains, 'C' if out of constrains and 'R' rejected. {image primary HDU keyword: ESOGRADE}

Column.Name: mjdEnd
Column.Description: Modified Julian Date of the observation end {image primary HDU keyword: MJD-END}

Column.Name: totalExpTimeSum
Column.Description: Total integration time of all exposures {image primary HDU keyword: TEXPSUM}

Column.Name: softAuth
Column.Description: Contact for bug reports {image primary HDU keyword: SOFTAUTH}

Column.Name: softDate
Column.Description: CIRDR release date {image primary HDU keyword: SOFTDATE}

Column.Name: softInst
Column.Description: CASU URL {image primary HDU keyword: SOFTINST}

Column.Name: softVers
Column.Description: CIRDR Version {image primary HDU keyword: SOFTVERS}

Column.Name: reqMaxAirmass
Column.Description: Requested maximum airmass {image primary HDU keyword: HIERARCH ESO OBS AIRM}

Column.Name: reqMaxSeeing
Column.Description: Requested maximum seeing {image primary HDU keyword: HIERARCH ESO OBS AMBI FWHM}

Column.Name: reqSkyTrans
Column.Description: Requested sky transparency {image primary HDU keyword: HIERARCH ESO OBS AMBI TRANS}

Column.Name: containerID
Column.Description: Scheduling container ID {image primary HDU keyword: HIERARCH ESO OBS CONTAINER ID}

Column.Name: containerType
Column.Description: Scheduling container type {image primary HDU keyword: HIERARCH ESO OBS CONTAINER TYPE}

Column.Name: minMoonDist
Column.Description: Requested minimum angular distance to the moon {image primary HDU keyword: HIERARCH ESO OBS MOON DIST}

Column.Name: maxMoonFli
Column.Description: Requested maximum fractional lunar illumination {image primary HDU keyword: HIERARCH ESO OBS MOON FLI}

Table.Name: Programme

Column.Name: distanceMins
